mapper.sql: SELECT T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID, T.COMMODITY_NAME, T.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T.EXPIRY_DATE, T.DATA_SYNC_TRANS_DATE, T.CREATE_USER, T.CREATE_DATE, T.UPDATE_USER, T.UPDATE_DATE, (CASE WHEN CCPX.CROP_COMMODITY_ID_PEDIGREE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' else 'N' end) as IS_PEDIGREE_IND
mapper.select: FROM CROP_COMMODITY T LEFT JOIN CROP_COMMODITY_PEDIGREE_XREF CCPX ON CCPX.CROP_COMMODITY_ID_PEDIGREE = T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID WHERE T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID IN (SELECT (CASE WHEN CCPX2.CROP_COMMODITY_ID = #{cropCommodityId} THEN CCPX2.CROP_COMMODITY_ID_PEDIGREE ELSE CCPX2.CROP_COMMODITY_ID END) FROM CROP_COMMODITY_PEDIGREE_XREF CCPX2 WHERE #{cropCommodityId} IN (CCPX2.CROP_COMMODITY_ID, CCPX2.CROP_COMMODITY_ID_PEDIGREE) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CROP_COMMODITY ( CROP_COMMODITY_ID, COMMODITY_NAME, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE, DATA_SYNC_TRANS_DATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{dto.cropCommodityId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.commodityName, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.effectiveDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, #{dto.expiryDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, #{dto.dataSyncTransDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE CROP_COMMODITY SET COMMODITY_NAME = #{dto.commodityName, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{dto.effectiveDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, EXPIRY_DATE = #{dto.expiryDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, DATA_SYNC_TRANS_DATE = #{dto.dataSyncTransDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, UPDATE_USER = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE CROP_COMMODITY_ID = #{dto.cropCommodityId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN} AND DATA_SYNC_TRANS_DATE < #{dto.dataSyncTransDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}
